title: Hohn Breaks Citadel’s Record With $18.9 Billion Trading Profit
description: Chris Hohn broke the hedge fund profit record last year as rising stocks and global market volatility helped the industry rack up $543 billion worth of gains, also an all-time high.
content: Chris Hohn broke the hedge fund profit record last year as rising stocks and global market volatility helped the industry rack up $543 billion worth of gains, also an all-time high.
